name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-oriented Senior DevOps Engineer with 13+ years of experience in building and delivering robust applications, leveraging technologies such as **JavaScript**, **Node.js**, **AWS**, and **Azure**. Demonstrated expertise in developing cloud-native solutions and implementing **Serverless architectures** to optimize performance and cost-efficiency.
Proficient in **MongoDB** and adept at applying **Express** for backend development, ensuring responsive and scalable system design. Strong emphasis on **Clean Code** principles and thorough documentation to enhance maintainability and team collaboration.
Exceptional technical leadership and team management skills, fostering a proactive and empathetic work environment. Well-versed in problem-solving techniques, and demonstrating team orientation, I effectively communicate in English to bridge gaps and drive project success.

experience.responsibilities:
• Utilized **Node.js** and **MongoDB** to engineer scalable backend solutions, ensuring high availability and performance in line with business requirements.
• Leveraged **AWS** and **Azure** for cloud service management and deployment of serverless architectures, driving operational efficiency.
• Demonstrated strong **Technical Leadership** by guiding cross-functional teams on projects, fostering a culture of **Empathy** and effective **Team Management**.
• Advocated for **Clean Code** principles in software development processes, enhancing maintainability and reducing technical debt.
• Implemented proactive strategies for problem-solving, addressing potential issues before they escalated into critical incidents.
• Established comprehensive documentation protocols to support team members and ensure clarity in project deliverables.
• Orchestrated CI/CD pipelines using **GitHub Actions** and **Azure DevOps**, achieving deployment success rates of **99%** across multiple environments.
• Champion advanced security measures to protect sensitive data, ensuring compliance with industry standards across projects.
• Facilitated effective communication with stakeholders and team members in **English**, ensuring alignment on project objectives and timelines.
• Conducted regular code reviews and team training sessions, promoting knowledge sharing and continuous improvement in coding practices.

Utilized **JavaScript**, **Node.js** (Express) for modernizing core financial platforms by migrating to a microservices architecture, improving scalability and performance for high-volume transactional systems.
Led the technical direction for the development team, ensuring **clean code** practices and thorough **documentation** were maintained in all projects.
Managed team operations effectively, demonstrating strong **technical leadership** and **team management** skills through the successful delivery of software solutions in a dynamic environment.
Built interactive front-end applications leveraging **MongoDB**, **React** (18), **Vue 3**, **Next.js**, and **TypeScript**, employing **Redux Toolkit** and **Tailwind CSS** to design sleek, responsive interfaces for financial tools and admin panels, impacting **9** major financial products.
Delivered real-time analytics dashboards integrating **React**, **D3.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, providing operations teams with instant insights into transactions and anomalies, resulting in a **30%** increase in operational efficiency.
Designed and deployed an event-driven architecture using **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus**, ensuring seamless asynchronous communication across critical workflows such as payments and compliance, thereby facilitating **100% uptime** during peak transactions.
Developed ETL pipelines for ingesting financial data from internal and third-party sources using **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, supporting both batch and real-time processing, including the ingestion of financial data from **5** different sources.
Implemented and deployed machine learning models for fraud detection using **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure ML**, enabling proactive detection of suspicious activity based on user behavior and transaction patterns with a **95%** accuracy rate.
Created ML pipelines for real-time credit scoring, churn prediction, and transaction classification, leveraging **MLflow** and **Airflow** to integrate model inference into backend services, resulting in a significant reduction in processing time by **40%**.

• Demonstrated **Technical Leadership** by designing and optimizing backend services for a global e-commerce platform using **Node.js (Express)**, ensuring high availability, low latency, and scalability across essential modules like checkout and order fulfillment.
• Employed **JavaScript** in developing resilient web applications, enhancing user interaction and efficiency throughout the platform.
• Leveraged **AWS** and **Azure** for scalable cloud infrastructure management, effectively supporting a high-traffic environment with over **100,000** daily users.
• Applied **Serverless** architecture for deployment efficiency, significantly reducing costs and deployment time by up to **30%**.
• Engineered real-time features utilizing **Kafka** for event-driven architecture, enabling responsive order updates and dynamic inventory tracking with less than **5 seconds** of latency.
• Oversaw team management and collaboration, fostering a culture of **Proactivity** and **Empathy** that improved team engagement scores by **25%**.
• Developed and maintained clean code documentation as part of best practices, ensuring maintainability and project cohesiveness across a team of **12** developers.
• Engaged in problem-solving sessions that led to successful troubleshooting of efficiency issues, resolving **95%** of production incidents within the first hour.
• Delivered thorough reviews and feedback on code via pair programming, cultivating a team-oriented approach that improved code quality and reduced technical debt by **40%**.
• Ensured compliance with GDPR and security standards through implementation of role-based access control (RBAC) and **OAuth 2.0** protocols, securing user data effectively.
• Utilized team orientation and strong communication skills in mentoring junior developers, contributing to their professional growth and enhancing overall team performance.
